description:
## Overview
  `@front10/landing-page-book/Analytics` is used to send statistics of visits to google analytics
  ## How to use
  1- Add following content to import the component:
  ```js
   import Analytics from "@front10/landing-page-book/dist/components/Analytics";
  ```
  2- Put this code into jsx page:
  ```html
   <Analytics idTracking='UA-0000000-1' />
  ```

idTracking.description: Tracking ID code of your property in google analytics

urlPath.description: Path you want to track, for example '/section/page1'

defaultValue.value:
typeof window !== 'undefined' && typeof window.location !== 'undefined'
  ? window.location.pathname + window.location.search
  : ''

debug.description: If set to true, will output additional feedback to the console

testMode.description: Enable test mode in the component
